sentence.Network_en: The salt marshes and mud flats attract large numbers of waterfowl.
sentence.Network_cn: 盐碱地和泥滩吸引了大量水鸟。

sentence.Network_en: Thousands of waterfowl breed round the lake and live off the fish.
sentence.Network_cn: 数以千计的水鸟在湖边繁殖,靠鱼为食来生活.

sentence.Network_en: Wild waterfowl are considered the natural reservoir of all influenza A viruses.
sentence.Network_cn: 野生水鸟是A型流感病毒的天然宿主.

entry.tran: 水鸟，水禽(尤指鸭、鹅、天鹅等)
entry.def: Waterfowl are birds that swim in water, especially ducks, geese, and swans.
